subject: Miniatures Poll
event:
Here's the final results on our poll for Dark Sword Miniatures:

Prince Oberyn Martell, Red Viper of Dorne
 642 (36.2%)

Princess Arianne Martell
 133 (7.5%)

Tyrion Lannister, the Imp
 1191 (67.1%)

Shae
 154 (8.7%)

Brienne, the Maid of Tarth
 739 (41.7%)

Samwell Tarly
 349 (19.7%)

Robb Stark, the Young Wolf
 770 (43.4%)

Asha Greyjoy
 478 (26.9%)

Lady Catelyn Stark
 424 (23.9%)

Prince Joffrey Baratheon
 171 (9.6%)

So the winners are 
         TYRION LANNISTER, THE IMP
         ROBB STARK, THE YOUNG WOLF
         BRIENNE, THE MAID OF TARTH
         PRINCE OBERYN MARTELL, RED VIPER OF DORNE

These four will be part of Dark Sword's second wave of miniatures, along with Daenerys Targaryen, Ser Gregor Clegane, and four "supporting cast" figures.

As first runner-up, Asha Greyjoy will be included in the next poll, when we ask who you want to see in wave #3.  The others will have to wait their turn.

Live Journal polls cannot be turned off, so far as I can tell, so the post will remain in place and presumably new people will still stop by and vote from time to time, changing the figures... but this is the "official" end count.

My thanks to all those who participated.  Tyrion is pretty pleased as well.

comments.article: Finally, something good happening for Tyrion!

comments.upictitle: I can see Alaska from here!: counting up my demons [ trinity ]
comments.article: I'm really happy about Robb! He's one of my favorite characters in the series, so I'm glad to see other people want more of him, too. :D
Because people were voting for four figures.

yay for women, bisexuals and dwarves. And teenagers with too much responsability, I guess!

Tyrion is pretty pleased as well.
Tyrion's such a Mary Sue :pp


(I am actually kidding about the latter, don't kill me fen)
I approve. who knew that it would be that close between Tyrion and Robb, only 421 votes.
sounds cool. hope to see a Theon next time.
I was hoping to see Sam do better, oh-well.  I'm still glad to see Tyrion, Brienne and Robb, Sam was my 3rd choise, not my 1st
Me too, who wouldn't like to see a fat Sam?!..  grr
comments.subject: Sam would have been nice..

comments.article:
SPOILERS IF YOU HAVEN'T FINISH STORM OF SWORDS FOLLOW
(But seriously, if you haven't, why are you messing around on the internet instead of reading?)


Will Robb come with an exchangeable wolf head for post Red Wedding action? XD

And I would like to propose a ban on Catelyn and her worthless daughter Sansa as figurines. Perhpas there could be a poll on how the manner in which Sansa is brutally murdered...

I've never forgiven her for her betrayal of Eddard and Arya.
comments.subject: Catelyn

comments.article:
Woo, go Obama!

...whoops, wrong election fever.

Whoo, go Tyrion!
Hmmm... that felt fake...
Tyrion needs some love right now. I'm happy we could oblige!

comments.upictitle: [not pictured]: Osaka trouble out of it worried idea
comments.article:
You can edit the post containing the poll just like any other post, but the poll will be represented by a single "lj-poll" item, so basically all you can do is delete it and replace it with the final tally. Also, when you're creating a poll you can choose to view the poll's source code and maybe paste it into a post with other content as well, although you can never change the content of a poll once it's been posted.

In return for this helpful information, I'd like to solicit bonus votes for Asha. She deserves to win something!

comments.upictitle: J3n the Destruct0r: OH HAI I LIEK ABORTIONS
comments.article: YAY I LOVE MIDGETS!
Very cool!  I can't wait to see Tyrion.  Pity Samwell didn't make it, though.

Hooray Tyrion!

I'm so excited to see the new set
This poll thing is all good and well, but when might we expect the next book?

comments.article: How DARE

comments.article: Tyrion is a star even if i voted for Rob Stark myself; )
Whee! Tyrion FTW! <3

comments.upictitle: Melissa D. Johnson: X-Mas Hachi Presents
comments.article:
Yay! <3 I am so happy to see that all my choices got it!

Personally, I would love to see a Sansa figure. It could be so beautiful. You need more of the pretty girls in your figure lines.

Why would anyone want a figurine of one of the most loathed and worthless characters in the history of books...

Have you forgotten what she did to her father and sister???
comments.subject: Death to Sansa

comments.article:
I approve and approve heartily.

I'm also glad Oberyn got it. He made an impression on me, despite not appearing in a huge chunk of the series. It's good to see I wasn't the only one who really liked him.
Can't believe Joff got higher than Shae!  Oh well, my favorites made the cut so yay them.
Some people must be wanting to paint the extra large pouting lips on Joff.
comments.subject: My thoughts exactly!

comments.article:
I'm happy with all 4, but Oberyn and Tyrion in particular. Tyrion for obvious reasons (he's like an old friend whenever I read one of his chapters), but Oberyn also made an impression on me in a short amount of time.

Ever since I finished the books that are out now, I've consistently wondered about Oberyn's past. Honestly, I would salivate over further stories of this enigmatic, cunning, and bicurious Prince. :)
comments.subject: Oberyn and Tyrion

comments.article:
You might consider a similar idea for determining the fate of characters in the future (who should die next? etc.). What power I would feel my vote wielded.

And yes, I'm joking, and know that would be perverse.
I like the idea and I vote for Sansa to die next. Perhaps she could be fed to Shagga's goats.
comments.subject: Death Vote

comments.article: Did anyone else notice that it was only the characters with spiffy titles that got in?  (The Imp, The Young Wolf, etc. etc.)  I sense a conspiracy here!  I really wanted to see Asha make it, so I guess she'll need a keen title if this trend continues...
So... will there be an optional nose, for those who like their figures whole and those who like them... less so?
